samples: A rock concert will be held next month.

contents-list.explanation: a place where movies are made.
samples: I rented a studio in the city.

contents-list.explanation: a person who directs a play, movie, etc.
samples: He is a protential movie director.
The movie was shot in Australia.

contents-list.explanation: the character played by an actor.
samples: I had a major role in the city.

contents-list.explanation: a room where performers, actors, etc., can change their clothes.
samples: He waited in his dressing room util it was time for him to appear on stage.

contents-list.explanation: the words that an actor speaks in a play, movie, etc.
samples: All of the actors should have their lines memorized by next Friday.

contents-list.explanation: a special ability that allows someone to do something well.
attractive to look at usually in a simple or delicate way.
a place where a movie or television program is filmed or a play is performed.
the signature of a famous person.
samples: We asked her for her autograph.

contents-list.explanation: to perform the words and actions of a character in a play, movie, etc.
samples: She can sing, dance, and act.

contents-list.explanation: a small group of people who play, and, or sing pop music together.
samples: The Beatles will always be the world's most famous pop group.

contents-list.explanation: a meeting between a reporter and another person in order to get information for a news story.
samples: The journalist is doing interviews with political leaders.

contents-list.explanation: a group of people who gather together to listen to something, such as a concert, or watch something, such as a movie or play.
a raised platform in a theater, auditorium, etc., where the performers stand.
samples: The actors walked out onto the stage.
